This film is based on the novel by J.R.R Tolkien. The movie tells the story of Frodo Baggins who is tasked with destroying a powerful ring that was created by a dark lord. The movie follows Frodo as he travels with a group of companions including Gandalf the wizard, Bilbo Baggins, Samwise Gamgee, and Pippin Gamgee. Along their journey, they encounter various challenges including battles against evil forces, navigating treacherous landscapes, and facing personal struggles. Despite these challenges, they remain determined to complete their mission and destroy the ring.
